Name: Mrinal Gautam
Title: Heritage school
Review: This is one of the oldest and at one time best school of U.P., Situated on university road at one time it was "The School" of Lucknow. The area of the school is as big as university.

Name: kushBans
Title: Old place !!
Review: Decent view from outside. Can give it a visit if you are passing from it's near by. Not much to see.

Name: Montu
Title: Un-fadeable  Glory
Review: A School's glory can only be judged by its products -- global standing of  Colvin's alumni tells its own story!   Though the buildings and ambiance which creates the excellence are astounding too!  For me it was the teachers- but that come and goes!  For visitors it is a very interesting site also, to absorb history of a princely era, now only scene in films an TV period dramas!

Name: himanshulko
Title: Personality Development
Review: I have done schooling from Colvin Taluqdars College. All teachers were technical good & efficient, especially our Principal Mr. Tandon. Library was also Good. On the hole THE best college of Lucknow.

Name: infojonny
Title: Old College
Review: This College  is very old in Lucknow they have ground swimming pools over here this college is very famous

Name: Aarav K
Title: Colvin
Review: I have gone here. This is taluq dar college. It is old enough. One would like to tell that there is nothing special for travelers.

Name: AAA
Title: Taluqdars College
Review: Colvin taluqdars college is very old college of lucknow. There's nothing special to visit in it. Can be visited once to see.

Name: _adhikarigautam10
Title: colvin talukedars..
Review: colvin talukedar...its not looks like a visint point in lucknow ..for lucknowers ..but i heard and read that its a good college in its time..but now its repo is not so good..the best thing i know in talukedar is its pool whick provide swimming facility...

Name: Dryogendranath M
Title: VISIT TO COLVIN TALUQDARS' COLLEGE
Review: This is the old college of educational excellence. Taluqdars means elite class and originally the college was said to be meant for the students coming from elite class. The College has got good and attractive building and in the heat of the city and near Lucknow University. The College was the centre for attraction when the Prime Minister visited the College in the recent past.

Name: Mohsin A
Title: Not for tourists
Review: This Is one of Lucknow's older collège. There is nothing for a tourist.  Near to Lucknow University. One Can ses Old style architecture here.

Name: Ghazi A
Title: Very good place in lucknow( shaan of lucknow )
Review: Love this place i m studying at this school. Nice place for visit it have big grounds and airy classes this is made by sir AKULAND COLVIN IN 1884 .

Name: zia535
Title: Swimming Pool & Historical Building
Review: its pride of lucknow.  I may say it a heritage building. One can visit it if someone has time.The buildings are beautiful and interesting in architecture

Name: Arpit141
Title: Very old and reputed college
Review: Colvin Taluqdars' College in Lucknow is one of the oldest and very reputed public schools in India.You can see the old Lucknow structure college buildings which is a great experience to watch.

Name: manoj k
Title: Old Legacy
Review: It a School ,having a Huge ground , the building have some Structural/architectural Value. Just Fine to Visit here.

Name: Shivanshu74
Title: Swimming and Cricket
Review: I visited for swimming as this is one of the places in lucknow where you can pay per day or join on monthly basis for swimming. They also have cricket coaching available open to public not sure on the charges for cricket however swimming goes for 100 INR per day. It is clean and well maintained i would say. Located in a accesible place near Hazratganj.

Name: lucknowkitchenin
Title: heritage school
Review: its pride of lucknow.......... the big ones and now famous entire globe have studied here and have produced many leaders too

Name: HBHB59
Title: It has been alma mater to many including me .
Review: Historical buildings and very majestic ambience. A great seat of learning .for those who studied here upto say early eighties it was an honor

Name: SKBhatiya
Title: Old Colonial Building
Review: A very Old colonial building gives you the feel of the British Era, a school once was the prime of Lucknow not its just another scholl

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: college
Review: an old college in Lucknow, situated nearby Lucknow station. It has its own heritage for its degree college, Many students have risen from this college to respected position

Name: DotDivx
Title: Old College and Heritage Building
Review: This is one of the oldest college in Lucknow and it building is very old, I may say it a heritage building. One can visit it if someone has time.

Name: RajeshMisraDr
Title: Have a good lawn tenis court
Review: I personally visit this college almost daily to play tenis , saif Acadamy maintained it well . This court also have lights so one can play in the late evening hours.

Name: SUDHIR J
Title: Good building but hardly maintained.
Review: It was once upon a time a very prestigious school. Now it is in a bad shape. The buildings are beautiful and interesting in architecture but because of lack in maintenance it is loosing its beauty and glory.

Name: Shussa
Title: Educational History
Review: Beautiful place ... excellence in education! History speaks .... long list of successful students, very beautiful. A place in Indian history, architecture, education, society excellence, Lucknavi tehzeeb ka ek jeeta jagta majmoowa.
